Recreating this Repo’s Documentation¶

In order to generate a local copy of the html documentaiton that is present in this repo, first you need to clone this repo by going to the project’s GitHub Page.

Once you’ve done this, be sure to install the requirements listed in the requirements.txt file. You can do this by running

pip install -r requirements.txt

from the command line. This will ensure you have all of the required python modules that the demos and python scripts depend on.

After you have done this, you can follow the steps mentioned in How to set up Sphinx to build the html files with either the Makefile or sphinx-build methods.
